Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, running east and west through town.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road, you can see the great Fellowship Hall, home of the religious cult known to most as just the Fellowship. On the south side of the road is the Oceancrest Recycling Plant, where useless goods are disposed of and recycled into more useless goods.
